alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:54PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sheridan County through 745 PM MDT... At 652 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms spreading off the Bighorn Mountains, moving east at 40 mph. These storms combined with a cold front will bring a push of strong northwest winds along the east side of the mountains...impacting travel on I-90 through Sheridan county. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Big Horn, Clearmont, Leiter, Banner, Ucross and Arvada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
